page.title: 07The May Show:Hadleigh
page.content: Hadleigh May Show is an agricultural show held on the last Saturday in May in Holbecks Park. It attracts many people from Hadleigh and the surrounding districts. All the shops in Hadleigh have a stall and there are many trade stands and some clubs have stalls as well.Local schools enter an Art competition. One end of the field is used for farm animals. Usually the Hadleigh Fire Engine stands at the entrance and little children are allowed on it. There is also a fair which goes on into the evening. All through the day there are events going on in the Ring.
